name: Maven Bio
long_description:
Maven Bio empowers business development teams, consultants, and bankers focused on BioPharma to perform end-to-end analysis workflows typically done by a junior analyst in a fraction of the time. 

Maven Bioâ€™s AI Analyst can construct a full competitive landscape, research specific drugs or companies, or analyze trial data, all by leveraging our curated content library of over 10 million BioPharma documents.

In contrast to general purpose market intel solutions, Maven Bio is designed for the needs of BioPharma, with deep feature sets built around high-leverage industry workflows, all with the goal of empowering teams to understand their market and competitive landscape.

Try it now at mavenbio.io
one_liner: Your AI analyst for BioPharma market intelligence
